Message:
The piercing sound of steel
brought me back to my senses.

I could make out an eerie light
getting cleaved into two.

Standing within the
crystal fragments was...
a black-caped hero...

That was the day
I met Queen Amleth!

Queen Amleth saved me,
flipping her cape and leaving
without even giving me time
to thank her.

It was my first time
seeing Her Highness.
She was so pretty...
so cool...

She was exactly like
the Vikings I admired
so much...!
